content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
- Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) 
- Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that puts items into the furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
- BeltGroup that connects the area to the furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)

### Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest (position (52.5, -82.5)) that stores iron plates

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
- Ensure that the furnace fuel source is not full before adding more fuel

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the burner inserter has the required items to pick up before attempting to pick up items
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a valid drop position before attempting to drop items

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
